CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS(TEXT(RF_List_Override__c),"Exclude") , "To Be Excluded", IF( Macro_Site__r.Forced_Removal__c = 'Y', "Forced Removals", IF( AND( CONTAINS( Macro_Site__r.ADM_NationalRFResponse__c , "Approved"), CONTAINS( Macro_Site__r.BKL_Vetted_For_Decom__c , "Approved"), CONTAINS( Macro_Site__r.ADM_NationalLeaseResponse__c , "Approved") ) , "With National Response", "Blank National Responses")))
CustomField.label: Tab Formula Hardlock
